message: there is a trac-creds file in this project that is ignored using .gitignore, and it was not uploaded to my application (I could see that in the console log)
just for the upload, I removed .gitignore, and then it worked
Yesterday, I uploaded a modified version of the django dev dashboard to ep.io (see http://sparkboard.ep.io) and as I wrote in a wrong topic, I think I have seen a bug :
BTW, I really love the system.
Alex Gaynor told me yesterday that it was known, but I do not think this is documented somewhere
@madewulf That was fixed in the 0.2.5 release of the client: http://www.ep.io/docs/client/#id5 - are you up to date?
